import React from 'react' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/client' import { CURRENT_USER } from '../gql/queries' const Recommendations = (props) => { const currentUser = useQuery(CURRENT_USER) if (!props.show) { return null } console.log(currentUser.data) const recommendedBooks = props.books.allBooks return(

Recommendations

books in your favorite genre

{recommendedBooks.map(b => )}
author published
{b.title} {b.author.name} {b.published}
) } export default Recommendations
